name: Thomas Edison
what_did:
Edison invented many useful things, including the electric light bulb.
He also made improvements to the phonograph and motion pictures.
He held over 1,000 patents and helped bring electricity to homes and cities.
why_matters:
Edison's inventions changed everyday life.
Thanks to him, people could light their homes at night and enjoy music and movies.
He showed how hard work and curiosity could lead to big ideas.
